definition: to look after/to take into consideration/to attend to

sentences.english: Enjoy a free $25 cash voucher with a purchase of two quarts of ice cream.
sentences.chinese: 惠顧兩磅裝雪糕兩筒，可免費獲贈$25現金券一張。

sentences.english: Our fashionaBle dress shop has specially set up a popular clothes counter, and welcomes your patronage.
sentences.chinese: 本時裝店專設熱門貨服裝櫃檯，歡迎惠顧。

sentences.english: Welcome and thank you for visiting Dongguan Dabu Washing Supplies Factory.
sentences.chinese: 感謝您惠顧東莞市麻涌大步洗衣粉廠。

sentences.english: Welcome to the new and old customers to patronize .
sentences.chinese: 歡迎廣大新老客戶前來惠顧。

sentences.english: Welcome new and old customer presence .
sentences.chinese: 竭力歡迎新老客戶光臨惠顧。

sentences.english: Welcome domestic and international enterprise and friend to patronize cooperation heartily.
sentences.chinese: 熱忱歡迎國內外企業和朋友惠顧合作。

sentences.english: Chairman of the board of directors DuKaison welcomes newly old user's your patronage wholeheartedly, and stratagems the development altogether.
sentences.chinese: 董事長杜開松竭誠歡迎新老用戶惠顧，共謀發展。

sentences.english: Welcome new and old customers throughout the visit, we will provide you with quality services.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎新老顧客光臨惠顧，我們將爲您提供優質的服務。

sentences.english: Sincerly welcome the friends at home and abroad to visit our company.
sentences.chinese: 真誠歡迎國內外友人惠顧，我公司將竭誠爲您服務。

sentences.english: The electronic products of our company are made with the latest equipment and technology. Your patronage is solicited.
sentences.chinese: 本公司的電子產品，採用最新設備和工藝，歡迎惠顧。

sentences.english: Please remember the sign of the Minlongda brand, and be ware of imitations .
sentences.chinese: 承蒙惠顧，請認準閩龍達商標標誌，謹防假冒。

sentences.english: To undertake the special kinds of non-standard cylinders and customized product design, Welcome!
sentences.chinese: 承接各種非標氣缸與特殊產品設計訂做，歡迎惠顧。

sentences.english: Have you patronized in Lane Crawford in the previous time?
sentences.chinese: 對上一次你有沒有惠顧過連卡佛？

sentences.english: Our company supplies stretch cotton plaid dying cloth. Your patronage is welcome.
sentences.chinese: 我公司供應棉彈力方格染色布，歡迎惠顧。

sentences.english: We welcome new and old customers to visit us, in the new century and development.
sentences.chinese: 竭誠歡迎新老客戶光臨惠顧，在新的世紀裏共圖發展。

sentences.english: Sincerely welcome friends all over the world to visit our company.
sentences.chinese: 真誠歡迎五湖四海的朋友光臨惠顧。

definition: to be popular/to be getting on well/much in demand
on call/always available/ready at all times
to be reimbursed for actual expenses
guests feel at home (in a hotel, guest house etc)/a home away from home
(Tw) medical checkup/physical examination (abbr. for 健康檢查|健康检查[jian4 kang1 jian3 cha2])
a fish that escaped the net (idiom)/(fig.) sb or sth that slips through the net
to eat one's fill/to be full
to compete to be the first to answer a question (as on a quiz show)
to be up to one's ears in work (idiom)/to be unable to attend to other things at the same time
